events.message: We have received the application for the Software Engineer position and the candidate has submitted all required documents.
The candidate's profile has been categorised under Engineering for the software developer role based on the submitted resume.
Recruiter Jane Smith has been assigned to manage the application process for the software engineering candidate.
Initial screening call completed; the candidate showed strong communication skills and relevant software development experience.
Candidate responded promptly and positively to the screening results and expressed eagerness to proceed to the technical interview stage.
Technical interview has been scheduled for the candidate on June 5th at 10:00 AM with the senior engineering team.
The candidate completed the technical interview and demonstrated strong problem-solving capabilities and coding skills.
HR interview was scheduled following positive technical feedback; it will take place on June 7th at 3:00 PM.
HR interview completed successfully; candidateâ€™s cultural fit and expectations align well with the company values.
An employment offer has been proposed to the candidate including salary details, start date, and benefits package.
The candidate has provided positive feedback regarding the offer and is reviewing the details before making a final decision.
The candidate accepted the offer and confirmed the intended start date; we are ready to commence onboarding procedures.
Onboarding process has started with orientation sessions scheduled and initial paperwork completed successfully.
The hiring process has officially been closed with the candidate fully integrated into the engineering team.
